name: Fish Tank Empire
description:
To Buy:

Drag fish and objects from the side bar into the tank, they will spawn in when  mouse button is released.

To Sell:

Drag cross over fish you want to sell and you will be given money based on the fishes size

Breeding:

Breed fish by placing a purple seaweed nearby, once the fish has seen this and a partner, breeding will take place

Rocks(power-up):

Used to increase the amount of food seaweed produce

Credits:

Coding & Music: Lorne Smith

Art: Kenney

Aquarium Sound: freesfx.co.uk

Made For the Kenney 2022 Game Jame (Topic: Growth)
